lead_paragraph: Gabriela Petrova had her doping ban lifted by the I.A.A.F. less than a week after WADA announced an amnesty for some athletes who had tested positive for meldonium.
snippet: Gabriela Petrova had her doping ban lifted by the I.A.A.F. less than a week after WADA announced an amnesty for some athletes who had tested positive for meldonium.
abstract: International Association of Athletics Federations lifts doping suspension of Bulgarian triple jumper Gabriela Petrova after World Anti-Doping Agency announces amnesty for athletes who tested positive for meldonium before March 1, 2016.
